dialog-zappy-start.name: %Uncle Zappy%
messages: Did you remember to feed %Mr. Tickles%?

dialog-goodmorning-wake.name: %PLAYER%
messages: Ahh, what a good night's sleep!

dialog-goodmorning-start2.name: %Uncle Zappy%
messages:
We were beginning to think you were going
to sleep through your big day!

dialog-goodmorning-start4.name: %Aunt Zippy%
messages:
Don't worry! We weren't about to let you
miss it!

dialog-goodmorning-start6.name: %Uncle Zappy%
messages:
Your 16th birthday is a big day. But no
matter what happens, we're proud of you
and the mage you've become.

dialog-goodmorning-start7.name: %PLAYER%
messages:
It's just the most important day in my
life, but I'll definitely be okay.

dialog-goodmorning-start8.name: %Uncle Zappy%
messages:
Come along, now! The village elders are
all waiting for you!

dialog-magejournal.name: %Mage Journal%
messages:
I'm turning 16 soon, and I keep wondering
what my magic will turn out to be.

Maybe I'll be able to turn invisible!
Or fly!

But really, my power will probably turn
out to be something dumb.

I just hope I don't make a mess of
anything. The town is already messed up
enough from the Big Bad's hacks.

dialog-magebox.name: %PLAYER%
messages:
I can't even remember what's in that box.
Comics? Amiibos? Otomatones?

dialog-magefacts.name: %Mage Facts%
messages:
Did you know you can press X to run,
circle to interact with something,
and square to perform a short animation?

dialog-magefacts.name: %PLAYER%
messages:
What say you about triangle, Mage Facts
Magazine?
